name: Slime Clicker (Frupsi)
description:
GENERAL

A game made for the Knitweave Jam 3 with the themes:

  • Platformer 
  • Clicker

This game was made in a time span of about 6 hours.

HOW TO PLAY

Click the spawning slime to earn coins and upgrade your stats.

GOAL

Get 10 of the rarest slimes.

Feel free to try to speed run the game and post your fastet time in the comments.
